mapper.select:
select B.clientgrp_name group_name, A.col1 group_idx, A.col2 sub_groups from(select col1, group_concat(col2) col2 from TEMP_T
where col1 in
#{item}
group by col1) A, CLIENTGRP_LIST B where A.col1 = B.clientgrp_idx order by B.clientgrp_name

select IFNULL(sum( case when A.invalid_flag = 0 and (A.create_date > #{start_date} and A.create_date < #{end_date}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) new_device, IFNULL(sum( case when A.invalid_flag = 1 and (A.delete_date > #{start_date} and A.delete_date < #{end_date}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) delete_device, IFNULL(sum( case when A.invalid_flag = 0 then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) running_device from CLIENT_MAST A where A.clientgrp_idx in
#{item1}

select os_type,
IFNULL(sum( case when invalid_flag = 0 and (create_date > #{start_date} and create_date < #{end_date}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) new_device, IFNULL(sum( case when invalid_flag = 1 and (delete_date > #{start_date} and delete_date < #{end_date}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) delete_device, IFNULL(sum( case when invalid_flag = 0 then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) running_device from CLIENT_MAST where os_type is not null
and os_type in
#{item2}
group by os_type

select client_name, ip_addr, mac_addr, os_type, create_date from CLIENT_MAST
create_date > ${start_date} > and create_date < ${end_date} and invalid_flag = 0
delete_date > ${start_date} > and delete_date < ${end_date} and invalid_flag = 1
and clientgrp_idx in
#{item1}
